replies.msg:
Hsbc responded that they closed the bank account already. Which means that money have already left their account. Likely it is now at a personal insurance company - there’s where the blocking sits. If you were to renovate you can dig out where the money sits now.

Some people said Hsbc filed a str. First, you don't have any evidence on this. Even so, a bank files thousands of str every year and police don't usually exercise blocks, of course with the exception of this case.

So all in all, the problem sits with black police, not the bank. Period.
